snippet.title: Old Gods Rising - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Old Gods Rising is a first-person adventure mystery, arriving for PC in Spring 2020.

Are the Old Gods really about to rise? Or, have you become the unwitting star of an elaborate hidden-camera movie, carefully orchestrated by a maverick director who will stop at nothing to create his final masterpiece?

Website:
https://www.badbloodstudios.com/

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1084990/Old_Gods_Rising/
